name: piebald
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(mainly of an animal) having a pattern of two different colours of hair, especially black and white: piebald ponies The llama and alpaca are of many colours, often white, brown, or piebald. Compare
pied
pinto
skewbald
nigelb10/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesThe woman was riding a small piebald horse.Suddenly huge piebald dogs surged around her.I noticed a large white cat with piebald patches sitting in the window.He was talking to a tall man with piebald black and grey hair.
